articles.author: Devendra Pandey
articles.title: Virat Kohli takes a break, to sit out white-ball games in South Africa - The Indian Express
articles.description: However, Virat Kohli is set to play the two-match Test series which begins with the Boxing Day game in Centurion; No clarity yet on Rohit Sharma's participation in white-ball games during tour of South Africa.
articles.content: Virat Kohli, the highest run getter at the recently-concluded World Cup, will not be available for selection for the white-ball games during India’s tour of South Africa, which begins with a T20 Inte… [+3632 chars]
